Name: City Spirit - Bond Street Brighton - Fleece Blanket (Small)
Short description: Cosy polar fleece blanket featuring Bond Street Brighton photography. Perfect for home, picnics, or beach days.
Description:
Cosy up with your favourite blanket. This soft and snuggly Plush Fleece Blanket is lightweight and comforting, good for wrapping up in on cold evenings or taking on picnics or to the beach to make your personal space.

Features:

  • 100% polyester polar fleece
  • Double-sided print
  • Soft and warm
  • Machine washable
  • Original XC Photography design

Care Instructions: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low

Name: High-Resolution Digital Download Pack
Short description: Complete set of high-res files from your photography session.
Description:
Receive all final edited images from your photography session in high-resolution format, perfect for print and digital use.

Includes:

  • 15-30 professionally edited images

Perfect for marketing materials, website, and social media
